description: When creating instance, it is possible to specify "'key_name': ''".  This empty string is treated as None by nova.compute.api._validate_and_build_base_options(), but gets written to DB.  Then it breaks Horizon when it creates the "Decrypt Password" button for instance details view, because 'key_name' is checked to be not None.
title: Empty string in key_name treated as None but gets into DB

comments.content: When creating instance, it is possible to specify "'key_name': ''".  This empty string is treated as None by nova.compute.api._validate_and_build_base_options(), but gets written to DB.  Then it breaks Horizon when it creates the "Decrypt Password" button for instance details view, because 'key_name' is checked to be not None.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~raorn

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content: I have posted two patches.  One treats empty key_name as non Null (and gives error trying to find matching keypair), other sets key_name to None when key_name is empty.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~raorn

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Alexey I. Froloff (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/142755
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/142752
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=2ad3009f3595e701a866f265263ca3a0a8ef09dc
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 2ad3009f3595e701a866f265263ca3a0a8ef09dc
Author: Alexey I. Froloff <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Dec 18 15:19:05 2014 +0300

    Do not treat empty key_name as None
    
    When running instance, empty ("") key_name is treated as None and
    keypair lookup does not happen.  However, empty string is written to
    key_name field in instance's database record.  When horizon renders
    instance info, it looks up keypair if key_name is not None.  Having
    empty string in this property generates error and instance info is not
    displayed.
    
    Change-Id: Ib67b124e6480f3435d31c983f1bfca769899c8e7
    Closes-Bug: #1403544
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit dd52617232c0915c85ca227e975c759c20e41b75
Author: Kent Wang <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Mar 10 08:44:32 2015 -0700

    Adds Not Null constraint to KeyPair name
    
    Since the API enforces that name is not null, the database schema and
    model are now updated to enforce this.
    
    Change-Id: I1088cc79f4998d3b6609891adbb0479381297ec4
    Related-Bug: #1403544
    Closes-Bug: #1189981
